# MySQL Parameters

mysql.host="localhost"
mysql.username="root"
mysql.password="root"
mysql.database="cppcms"

# FastCGI settings

server.threads = 5
server.buffer = 100
server.socket = "/tmp/php-fastcgi.socket"


# Blog configuration

blog.media_path = "/media"
blog.script_path = "/blog/test.fcgi"

# bdb 
bdb.path="./db/"

# Templates
templates.file = "./templates/look.template"

# gzip

# gzip - default disabled
gzip.enable=1


# For fastest compression gzip.level=1
#
 gzip.level = 1

# Use other buffer size then default
# gzip.buffer=256
